title: Jay Heartless on Growing Up Hoover, Getting Put on at 15, Investing & More
description:
T-Rell sits down with Jay Heartless to exchange experiences about street politics, rappers being fake and scared to collab, and more! ---- 00:00 Intro 3:07 - Growing up on 75th and Fig, growing up with moms being from the set 9:19 - Already knowing that rap was for him, the recording process, working with Empire 12:48 - The homie being fresh out from a 10yr bid over jewelry robbery and being on No Jumper 21:50 - Artist like Mozzy being on weird sh*t when it’s time to send features back, Mozzy unfollowing him 27:37 - Not having kids, moms making him fight his friends so they wouldn’t be scared of each other ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps!
